title: Login button not responding
description: Clicking the login button does nothing. No API call is made.

title: Page crashes on form submit
description: Submitting a form with empty fields causes the app to crash.

title: Broken image link on homepage
description: The hero image on the homepage is missing or returns a 404.

title: Search results not updating
description: Typing in the search bar does not trigger a new search request.

title: Logout does not clear session
description: User remains logged in after clicking logout. Session persists.

title: Modal stays open after route change
description: Navigating to another page does not close the currently open modal.

title: Data not saved after refresh
description: Changes made in the form are lost upon page refresh without warning.
